title: Extra services for special events
articleContent:
We’re running extra services for the events below events during March and April. Extra trains and trams will be scheduled to run in addition to the normal timetable. Please note that service times may differ due to traffic congestion around event venues. Please allow extra time for your journey.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Melbourne Olympic Parks

Extra trains and trams are running for the below events:

  • Thursday 20 March at 7.30pm - AFL Rd 2, Carlton v Hawthorn. 
  • Friday 21 March at 7.40pm - AFL Rd 2, Western Bulldogs v Collingwood. 
  • Saturday 22 March at 1.20pm - AFL Rd 2, Essendon v Adelaide Crows. 
  • Saturday 29 March at 1.20pm - AFL Rd 3, Melbourne v Gold Coast Suns.
  • Thursday 03 April at 7.30pm - AFL Rd 4, Collingwood v Carlton.
  • Saturday 05 April at 4.15pm - AFL Rd 4, Richmond v Brisbane Lions. 
  • Saturday 19 April at 1.20pm - AFL Rd 6, Melbourne v Fremantle Dockers.
  • Monday 21 April at 3.20pm - AFL Rd 6, Geelong v Hawthorn.
  • Thursday 24 April at 7.30pm - AFL Rd 7, Melbourne v Richmond. 
  • Friday 25 April at 3.20pm - AFL Rd 7, Collingwood v Essendon. 
  • Sunday 27 April at 3.20pm - AFL Rd 7, Carlton v Geelong. 

Extra tram services run as Route 70a between Flinders Street and Stop 7C MCG Gates 4-7/John Cain Arena or as Route 75a between Flinders Street and Stop 11 Jolimont Station/MCG.

Extra trams running to the above events will be accessible low-floor trams, depending on availability.

Marvel stadium

Extra trains and trams are running for the below events:

  • Saturday 22 March at 7.30pm - AFL Rd 2, St Kilda v Geelong. 
  • Sunday 23 March at 3.20pm - AFL Rd 2, North Melbourne v Melbourne. 
  • Thursday 27 March at 7.30pm - AFL Rd 3, Essendon v Port Adelaide.
  • Friday 28 March at 7.40pm - AFL Rd 3, Carlton v Western Bulldogs. 
  • Saturday 29 March at 4.15pm - AFL Rd 3, St Kilda v Richmond. 
  • Saturday 05 April at 7.35pm - AFL Rd 4, North Melbourne v Sydney Swans. 
  • Friday 18 April at 3.20pm - AFL Rd 6, North Melbourne v Carlton. 
  • Saturday 19 April at 7.35pm - AFL Rd 6, Richmond v Gold Coast Suns. 
  • Sunday 20 April at 7.20pm - AFL Rd 6, Western Bulldogs v St Kilda. 
  • Saturday 26 April at 1.20pm - AFL Rd 7, St Kilda v Brisbane Lions. 
  • Sunday 27 April at 4.40pm - AFL Rd 7, Hawthorn v West Coast Eagles.

Extra tram services run as Route 86a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Stadium Precinct/La Trobe Street or Route 30a between Stop 12 St Vincent’s Plaza and Stop D1 Stadium Precinct/La Trobe Street.

Extra trams running to the above events will be accessible low-floor trams, depending on availability.

AAMI Park/John Cain Arena

Extra trains and trams are running for the below events:

  • Tuesday 18 March at 7.30pm - Concert, Kehlani. 
  • Wednesday 19 March at 7.30pm - NBL Basketball Finals, Melbourne United v Illawarra Hawks. 
  • Thursday 20 March at 8pm - NRL Rd 3, Melbourne Storm v Penrith Panthers. 
  • Sunday 23 March at 3pm - Asian Women's Champions League, Melbourne City v Taichung Blue Whale. 
  • Tuesday 25 March at 8pm - Comedy, Russell Peters. 
  • Thursday 27 March at 7pm - Concert, Nelly. 
  • Saturday 29 March at 7.35pm - A-League Football Men, Melbourne Victory v Adelaide United. 
  • Wednesday 02 April at 7pm - Concert, Sodagreen. 
  • Saturday 05 April at 7pm - Super Netball, Melbourne Mavericks v Sunshine Coast Lightning. 
  • Wednesday 09 April at 7pm - Concert, Day6.
  • Wednesday 16 April, at 7.30pm - Concert, Toto. 
  • Sunday 20 April at 2pm - Super Netball, Melbourne Mavericks v Giants. 
  • Sunday 27 April at 2pm - Super Netball, Melbourne Vixens v West Coast Fever. 

Extra trams are running for the below events:

  • Saturday 29 March at 4.50pm - A-League Football Women, Melbourne Victory v Adelaide United. 
  • Sunday 13 April at 2pm - NRL Rd 6, Melbourne Storm v New Zealand warriors. 
  • Sunday 13 April at 4pm - Super Netball, Melbourne Vixens v Giants. 
  • Saturday 19 April at 5pm - A-League Football Men, Melbourne Victory v Auckland FC.
  • Friday 25 April at 8.10pm - NRL Rd 8, Melbourne Storm v South Sydney Rabbitohs. 
  • Saturday 26 April at 7.35pm - A-League Football Men, Melbourne City v Adelaide United. 

Extra tram services run as Route 70a between Flinders Street Station and Stop 7B Rod Laver Arena/MCG Gates 1-3 or Stop 7D Olympic Boulevard.

Extra trams running to the above events will be accessible low-floor trams, depending on availability.

Rod Laver Arena/Margaret Court Arena

Extra trains and trams are running for the below events:

  • Wednesday 19 March, Thursday 20 March, Saturday 22 March, Sunday 23 March at 7.30pm daily - Concert, Dua Lipa.
  • Thursday 27 March & Wednesday 02 April at 7.30pm – Cindy Lauper: Farewell Tour.
  • Thursday 27 March at 7.30pm - Concert, Cody Johnson.
  • Saturday 29 March at 7pm - Concert, Zhou Shen.
  • Saturday 29 March & Sunday 30 March at 7.30pm - Concert, Hans Zimmer Live.
  • Friday 11 April at 8pm - Concert, JJ Lin.
  • Friday 25 April at 12.00pm, Saturday 26 April & Sunday 27 April at 8.00am – Show, Intel Extreme Masters

Extra trams are running for the below events:

  • Tuesday 18 March at 7pm daily, Concert, Roxette. 
  • Wednesday 19 March at 7pm - Concert, Jon Pardi. 
  • Sunday 23 March at 7pm - Concert, Neha Kakkar. 
  • Saturday 29 March at 7.30pm - Concert, Human Nature.
  • Saturday 05 April at 7.30pm - Concert, Yellowcard.
  • Saturday 12 April at 7.30pm - Concert, Slowly Slowly.

Extra tram services run as Route 70a between Flinders Street Station and Stop 7B Rod Laver Arena/MCG Gates 1-3 or Stop 7D Olympic Boulevard.

Extra trams running to the above events will be accessible low-floor trams, depending on availability.

Flemington Racecourse/Melbourne Showgrounds

Extra trains and trams are running for the below events:

  • Thursday 20 March, Friday 21 March & Saturday 22 March at 9.00am daily – Victorian Careers & Employment Expo 2025
  • Saturday 29 March and Sunday 30 March at 10am daily - Supanova Comic Con and Gaming.
  • Saturday 29 March at 11:00am – TAB Australian Cup Race Day
  • Saturday 12 April at 1pm - Ultra Music Festival (various artists).
  • Friday 25 April at 12.00pm – ANZAC Day Race Day

Extra tram services run as Route 57a between Flinders Street Station and Stop 32 Sandown Road.
